section.title: Channel Server Configuration
section.para: These settings apply to only the channel server configuration.

section.title: Name
section.para: Name of the channel (shown in the old channel list).

section.title: ExternalIP
section.para: IP of the channel to give clients. If blank, the IP is auto-detected.

section.title: WorldIP
section.para: IP address of the world server to connect to. This defaults to 127.0.0.1 (localhost).

section.title: WorldPort
section.para: Port of the world server to connect to. This defaults to 18666.

section.title: Timeout
section.para: Number of seconds with no new packets until the client will timeout and be disconnected. Defaults to 0 (no timeout).

section.title: SystemMessage
section.para: System ticker message to show client upon connection to the channel. If blank, no ticker is shown.

section.title: SystemMessageColor
section.para: System ticker message color to use when displaying the configured SystemMessage. Valid options are RED, WHITE, BLUE and PURPLE.

section.title: AutoCompressCurrency
section.para: When set Macca and Magnetite will combine into notes and pressures when selling items and picking up drops.

section.title: PerfMonitorEnabled
section.para: Enables performance monitoring statistics of the server.

section.title: VerifyServerData
section.para: Enables server data verification upon startup, stopping the server if an issue is found.
